ygData.subject: RE: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: pulling a lot of shadowmen for my wizard s mask quest, i noticed that you can see them moving (as opposed to teleporting), but it is so fast it is almost not
ygData.messageBody:
pulling a lot of shadowmen for my wizard's mask quest, i noticed that you
can see them moving (as opposed to teleporting), but it is so fast it is
almost not noticeable. i have not tried to outrun them with my selo's drum.
though it is quite fast (yes it is noticeable over a mm drum Scully, i mean
Harm) i don't think it is anywhere near shadowmen speed.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L39 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > This reminds me, has any level 50 with a Selo's drum tried to outrun
> > shadowmen?
>
> Dunno, I'm convinced that the shadowmen don't actually move at a
> given speed, if they are in range of a player who irritates them
> they just kinda warp behind them. When I feared one, it just poofed
> I never saw him again. However, I've not tried to toe to toe outrun
> one. Then again I don't have a selo's drum. Since accelerando is
> speed capped, I'm not sure the difference between selo's and mm
> will be drastic.
>
> Harmonic.
>
